table.name: vtiger_listresorts
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listresorts` ( `listresortsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `resort` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `country` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `popular` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listresortsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_listresortscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listresortscf` ( `listresortsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listresortsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
